CSUSB's Veteran Dedicated Staff









Admissions to CSUSB Veterans Dedicated Staff




Ana Carrejo
Admissions Counselor/Evaluator Veterans Liaison (A-M)
To make an appointment please contact the Office of Admissions and Student Recruitment
Location: University Hall, Room 107
Phone: (909) 537-5188
Fax: (909) 537-7034
Email: asrveterans@csusb.edu
Website: Office of Admissions and Student Recruitment
Idalia Pineda-Vivar
Admissions Counselor/Evaluator Veterans Liaison (N-Z)
To make an appointment please contact the Office of Admissions and Student Recruitment
Location: University Hall, Room 107
Phone: (909) 537-5188
Fax: (909) 537-7034
Email: asrveterans@csusb.edu
Website: Office of Admissions and Student Recruitment
Cecilia Farmer
Admission Evaluator for Graduate Studies
Graduate and Student Research
Location: Chaparral Hall, Room 123C
Phone: (909) 537-5058
Email: Cecilia.Farmer@csusb.edu

SSgt Stephannie Cochran
Air Force ROTC Contact
Location: Faculty Office Building, Room 144
Phone: (909) 537-5440
Email: stephannie.cochran@csusb.edu
Website: Air Force ROTC
1LT John Seman

Veterans Success Center & School Certifying Officials




Agustin Ramirez
Veterans Success Center, Director & Back up VA Certifying Official 
Location: Coyote Bookstore, Lower Level, Room 006A
Phone: (909) 537-5195
Email: aramirez@csusb.edu
Website: Veterans Success Center
Jaime Espinoza
School Certifying Official -Veterans Success Advisor
Chapter 30, 31, 33, 35, 1606, Cal Vet Fee waiver 
Veterans Success Center 
Location: Coyote Bookstore, Lower Level, BK-005A
Phone: (909) 537-7196
Fax: (909) 537-7064
Email: Jespinoza@csusb.edu
Website: Veterans Success Center- VA Enrollment Certification Process
 
 




Student Financial Services Office- Veteran Dedicated Staff




Chris Han
Tuition Assistance, Chapter 31 Billing, and MyCAA
Student Financial Services Office 
Location: University Hall, Room 034
Phone: (909) 537-3268
Email: chris.han@csusb.edu




CSUSB Veteran Dedicated- Financial Aid 




Priscilla Ramirez
Student Services Professional -Office of Financial Aid & Scholarships 
Cal Vet Fee Waiver Processor for Financial Aid Portal
Location: University Hall, Room 139
Phone: (909) 537-3420
Email: pramire@csusb.edu
Website: Office of Financial Aid & Scholarships
Patricia Sotelo
Associate Director Financial Aid and Operations
Financial Aid Veterans Liaison
Location: University Hall, Room 139
Phone: (909) 537-3424
Email: Psotelo@csusb.edu
Website: Office of Financial Aid




CSUSB Veterans Dedicated Staff - Office of the Registrar 




Erin Vigil
Transfer and Graduation Counselor
Must have a CSUSB Coyote ID number
Office of the Registrar
Location: University Hall, Room 171
Phone: (909) 537-3819
Fax: (909) 537-7021
Email: erin.vigil@csusb.edu




CSUSB Coyote Bookstore Veteran Dedicated Staff 




Carla Camberos 
Follett Higher Education Group
Coyote Bookstore - California State University, San Bernardino and Palm Desert Campus
Main Contact for Chapter 31- Vocational Readiness and Employment Textbooks and Supplies only. 
Location: Coyote Bookstore, 6100 University Parkway, San Bernardino, CA, 92407 
Phone: (909) 537-3963
Email: camberos@follett.com & 1100asm@follett.com
Website: CSUSB Coyote Bookstore textbooks and supplies
